confidentiality.notes: stole proprietary source code from former employer and used the code to make software to sell to customers;  Shared sample of code on March 6,2015.  Remotely uploaded the proprietary software to undercover agent's network on Dec 2015.

integrity.notes: Xu previously modified the Proprietary Source Code's command interface to conceal the fact that the Proprietary Source Code originated with the IBM and identified multiple specific customers to whom Xu had previously provided the Proprietary Software using Xu's stolen copy of the Proprietary Source Code.  Xu used the code to make software to sell to customers.

discovery_notes: Xu resigned in May 2014. Xu started communicating with undercover agents in March 2015 through Dec 2015.  Xu shared sample code in March 6, 2015. Xu uploaded remotely uploaded files in Aug 2015.
notes: former employee resigned a year prior to incident; provided proprietary code and software to undercover agent for profit
summary: Ex-IBM employee from China arrested in U.S. for code theft
